translations.text: Ccekôan i Öebbi, id Issersen Tazmamt, i uxdim iS. Aâwaj, degs, ur Irri.
Tewqem, iwakken a ppâaggen $ef ssxev uwâiô, s$uôeS; u a pbecceô lmumnin ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar nnsen warraz igerzen.
Ad ilin degs, i lebda.
A ppâaggen i wid innan: "Öebbi Isâa mmi S".
Ur illi wayen ssnen fellas; akken, imezwura nnsen. D awal uqbiê id iff$en seg imawen nnsen. D tikerkas kan ay ssawalen.
Ahat a phelkev iman ik, ar loiha nnsen, a p$weblev, imi ur uminen ara s usali agi?
Ni$ Nerra i illan di tmurt, d ccbaêa ines, iwakken a Néeô menyif iten, ar igiten ilhan.
A Nu$al a Nerr, i illan degs, d akal ibuôen.
Ne$ t$ilev d At yifri kan, akked Öaqim, ay d lwehma, ger issekniyen nne£?
Mi ssôen iman nnsen ilmeéiyen deg ifri, nnan: "a Mass nne$! Efk ane$ d aêunu s$uôeK; Err a$ lameô nne$ d uûwib".
Deg ifri, Nesle$ imeééu$en nnsen, acêal iseggwasen.
Sinna, Nessker iten id, a Néeô anta, ger snat n trebbuyaâ, i iêesben acêal qqimen.
Nekwni, ad ak Neêku, s tidep, taqsiî nnsen. Nitni, ih, d ilmeéiyen, umnen s Mass nnsen. Nerna yasen nnhaya.
Nesseohed ulawen nnsen, mi kren nnan: "Mass nne$ d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur nepnuju, d awez$i, ar ôebbi, war Neppa, mulac a d nini awal dduni.
Widak d agdud nne$. Âabden iôebbiten, war Neppa. Ay$eô ur a$ d bbwin, fellasen, adabu n ûûeê? Anwa i idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Öebbi?
Mi ten tfuôqem, nitni akked wayen âabden war Öebbi, essôet iman nwen deg ifri. Ad awen Izraâ, Mass nnwen, seg uêunu S. Ad awen Iheggi amwanes i lameô nnwen".

A pwaliv iîij, mi d inqeô, iwexxeô i ifri nnsen, ar yeffus. Mi i$li, ad asen iâaddi $eô zelmev. Nitni, din, di littsaâ. Ayagi seg issekniyen n Öebbi. Win Inha Öebbi, neppa ipwanha; win Itlef, ur isâi, d awez$i, bab ara t inhun.
Ad as tiniv ukin, nitni îîsen. Ntezzi ten yeffus, zelmev. Aydi nnsen, $ef umnaô, iééel ivaôen is. Lemmer a ten twaliv, ad asen trewlev, si tugdi; a k terkeb, segsen, lefqaâ.

Akka ay ten id Nessenker, iwakken ad mesteqsin. Inna yiwen segsen: "acêal n lweqt ay tesâaddam"? Nnan d: "nesâadda ass ne$ ur ibbwiv wass". Nnan: "Mass nnwen Yif akw akken Izôa ay tesâaddam. Aznet ar temdint, yiwen segwen, s idrimen agi nnwen. Ad iwali anwa lqut iûfan mavi, ad awen d iawi ôôeéq, segs. Ad iêader iman is, iwakken ur awen ipfaq yiwen.
Nitni, war ccekk, ma éôan kwen, a kwen ôeomen, ne$ a kwen rren ar ddin nnsen, d$a ur trebêen, d awez$i".

Akka ay sen ten Nessken, iwakken ad éôen ar lemâahda n Öebbi d tidep; u, $ef yimir, ur illi ccekk. Mi mqellaân $ef lameô nnsen, nnan: "bnut axxam sennig sen. Mass nnsen Yif akw akken iten Issen". Nnan wid iwumi iâadda wawal, $ef lameô nnsen: "a nerr, ihi, lemqam sennig sen".

Ad inin: "di krav yidsen, aydi nnsen d wis kué"; u ad inin: "di semus yidsen, aydi nnsen d wis sdis", pqelliben tabavnit. U ad inin: "di ûa yidsen, aydi nnsen d wis îam". Ini: "Mass iw Yif akw akken Iéôa amvan nnsen. Drus kan i t iéôan". Ur pnamar fellasen, siwa $ef wayen id ivehôen. Ur ppesteqsay yiwen fellasen.
Ur qqaô ta$awsa a p xedme$, s tidep, azekka,
siwa ma Irad Öebbi. Mmekti d Mass ik, ma teppuv. Ini: "amar ad iyi Inhu Mass iw, ar wayen yifen ayagi di ûûwab".
Sâaddan, deg ifri nnsen, krav twinas iseggwasen, rnan tza nniven.
Ini: "Öebbi Yif akw akken Iéôa, acêal sâaddan. IneS tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Amek Neppa Ipwali, Isell! Ur sâin bab, war Neppa. Ur Izdukkul yiwen i useyyi S".
Mel ayen ik ed ippuweêêan, si Tezmamt n Mass ik. Ur illi ubeddel deg wawal iS. Ur teppafev ssôan, war Neppa, d awez$i.

Üebbeô iman ik, akked wid ipnujun ar Mass nnsen, taûebêit, tameddit, pnadin udem iS. Ur ten tekkes si ger wallen ik, a pvemâav lefnun n tmeddurt n ddunit. Ur ssemêas i win iwumi Nesse$fel ul is, ar usmekti nne£, i iddan d lhawiyya s, iwumi iffuhri lameô.

Ini: "tidep s$uô Mass nnwen. Ad iamen win ib$an, ad ijhel win ib$an". Ih, Nhegga d times, i imednas; ad asen zzin iêeoouoa s. Ma ppren d, ad asen ppunefken waman am uzzal ifsin. Ad cwin wudmawen nnsen. A tissit tamcumt, a tanezdu$t tucmip!
Ih, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, s tidep, ur Nveggiâ akafi n win ixedmen ayen ilhan.

I wigi, leonanat n Âaden, ddaw sen isaffen ppazzalen. Ad qqnen, dinna, imeqyasen n ddheb, ad lsen iceîîiven izegzawen n leêrir, êewcen s ddheb. Ad élen, degs, $ef imîeôêen izewwqen. A lebsa lâali, a tanezdu$t tumâint!
Awi yasen d amedya n sin irgazen. I yiwen, Nefka snat tebêirin n téuôin, Nezzi yasent tizdayin, Nerra iger garasent.
Yal tibêirt teppak ed l$ella s, ur ipxuûûu, segs, wacemma. Nesfeggev asif garasent.
I$ellet ed ppemôa. Inna i umdakwel is, mi s immeslay: "$elbe$ k taôkunt, iffe$ k alag".
Idens iman is mi ikcem leonan is, inna: "ur cukke$ ara, d awez$i, ad iqucc wayagi.
Ur cukke$ ara ad yili yimir, u ma bbwve$ ar Mass iw, ard affe$, war ccekk, ayen yifen aya, deg umekkan is".
Inna yas umdakwel is, mi s immeslay: "day tnekôev Win ik Ixelqen seg wakal, sinna, si tiqqit, sinna, Imessel ik d argaz?
Maca, Neppa d Öebbi, Mass iw. Ur pcarake$ yiwen, i Mass iw.
Lemmer id tenniv, mi tkecmev ar tebêirt ik: akken Irad Öebbi. Ur telli tezmert siwa s$uô Öebbi. Ma twalav iyi d, nek, tifev iyi ayla, tarwa,
Izmer Mass iw ad iyi d Ifk ayen i ifen tibêirt ik. A d Iazen $uôes ssxev, seg igenni, a ppu$al d aêecraruf issiccigen;
ne$, ad zzren waman is, ur ten teppafev, d awez$i".
Tqucc l$ella s. D$a la izeyyeô ifassen is, $ef wayen iseôôef fellas. Tqucc tfeôôant is. Inna: "a yamxix iw, a lemmer ur curke$ yiwen, i Mass iw"!
Ur as illi urbaâ ara t isellken, war Öebbi. Ur isellek iman is.
Akka, laânaya s$uô Öebbi, Tidep. Yif akw i ukafi, Yif akw i taggara.
Awi yasen d amedya n tmeddurt n ddunit. Am aman id Nesse$li seg igenni. Eâluâlen yissen im$an n tmurt. D$a u$alen d asa$uô, issebruzzaâ iten wavu. Ni$ Öebbi Izmer i yal cci.
Ayla akked dderya d ccbaêa n tmeddurt n ddunit. Ar Mass ik, leûlaê idumen ifen ten i ukafi, ifen ten i tmeôoiwt.
Ass ideg ara Nesselêu idurar, a pwaliv tamurt d aza$aô. A ten Nefser, ur Neppaoa yiwen segsen.
A d rsen zdat Mass ik, d leûfuf: "ni$ tusam a£ d, akken ikwen Nexleq tikelt tamenzut. Irna tetebbtem ar ur awen Neppara ppaâud, d awez$i".

Ters ed Tezmamt. A pwaliv ibe$wviyen s uêebbiô, $ef wayen illan degs. Qqaôen: "a yamxix nne$! Acimi tazmamt agi ur teooi ayen meééiyen, u wayen meqqwôen, armi ten teêseb"? Ufan illa wayen xedmen. Mass ik ur Idennis yiwen.

Mi Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem", knant, siwa Iblis. Neppa, si leonun, iaâûa lameô n Mass is. Day a ten terrem, neppa akked tarwa s, d imawlan, war Nek? U nitni d icenga nnwen! D abdil ucmit n imednas.
Ur ten Rri$ d inagan n lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan, ne$ n lxelq nnsen. Ur Ïîife$ im$eôôqen d imâiwnen.
Ass ideg ara d Yini: "neccdet wid iyI terram d icriken iW". Ad asen siwlen, ur asen d pparan. Nerra, garasen, asif n twa$it.
Ibe$wviyen ad walin times. ÊëËûan ar nitni, degs, ara $lin. Ur ppafen, segs, tisensert.
Ni$ Nefka d, di Leqwôan agi, yal amedya, i imdanen. Maca, ipnamar umdan sennig akw.
D acu i iîîfen imdanen ad amnen, mi ten id tusa nnhaya, u ad ste$fôen Mass nnsen? Ar ten id tas kan, tin ivôan d imezwura, ne$ ar d irs, zdat sen, uâaqeb?
Ur Neppazen imazanen, siwa i ubecceô d uneddeô. Wid ijehlen pnamaren, s tkerkas, îîeggiôen yissent tidep. Pmaâliken $ef issekniyen iW, akked wayen i$ef ppunedôen.

Anwa idensen sennig win iwumi d pwafekkôen issekniyen n Mass is, iwexxeô asen, u ippu i ixdem ufus is. Ih, Nerra aêurrim $ef wulawen nnsen, ur t fehhmen; akked tiâéegt deg imeééu$en nnsen. Ma tneccdev ten ar nnhaya, ur pwanhan, d awez$i.
Mass ik Ipsemmiêen, d Bab uêunu. Lemmer ad Iêud fellasen ilmend n wayen kesben, ad I$iwel ar uâaqeb nnsen. Maca, sâan ppaâud, ur ppafen segs tisensert.
Timdinin nni i Nesqucc mi densent, Nga ppaâud i usquccu nnsent.
Mi inna Musa i uqeddac is: "ur êebbse$ alamma bbwve$ ar umlili n sin ilellen, xas ad sâaddi$ tallit".
Mi bbwven ar umlili nnsen, ppun aslem nnsen. Iu$al ar yill d ilelli.
Mi zegren, inna i uqeddac is: "awi a$ d imekli nne$, ni$ naâteb deg inig nne$ agi".
Inna: "ur twalav ara, mi nreyyeê ar teéôut, nek ppu$ en aslem? D Cciîan kan iyi isseppun ur ak nni$. Ibbwi abrid is ar yill, d lwehma"!
Inna: "d ayagi ay neb$a". D$a u$alen d $ef isurifen nnsen.
Ufan d amdan seg imdanen nne£, iwumi Nefka aêunu s$uône£. Neslemd as tussna i illan $uône£.
Inna yas Musa: "Ma ad ddu$ yidek, ad iyi tesêefvev ay tesnev n ûûwab"?
Inna d: "keçç, s tidep, ur tezmiôev, yidi, a pûebôev.
Amek ara tûebôev i wayen i$ef ur tesâiv asali"?
Inna: "ad iyi tafev, ma Irad Öebbi, d aûebôi. Ur pnaqwame$ lameô ik".
Inna: "ma teddiv yidi, ur iyi d steqsay $ef wacemma, alamma smekti$ k id fellas".
Lêan, armi rekben di lbabuô. Ixeôq it. Inna: "txeôqev t, iwakken ad $evûen l$aci s! Ni$ ayen txedmev d dduni".
Inna: "day ur ak nni$ ara, keçç, s tidep, ur tezmiôev, yidi, a pûebôev, d awez$i"?
Inna: "ur iyi pqasa imi ppu$, ur ssukku lwaâôan $ef lameô iw".
Lêan, armi d mmugren ileméi. In$a t. Inna: "ten$iv amdan ur nen$i yiwen! Ni$ d ayen idensen ay txedmev".
Inna: "day ur ak nni$ ara, keçç, s tidep, ur tezmiôev, yidi, a pûebôev, d awez$i"?
Inna: "ma steqsa$ k $ef t$awsa, deffir ta, ur teddu yidi. Ni$ ssutre$ ak d ssmaê".
Lêan, armi bbwven ar imezda$ n yiwet n temdint, ssutren asen lqut. Ugin a ten snubgten. Ufan en lêiv, qôib ad i$li. Iûeggem it. Inna: "ma teb$iv, tzemrev a ppepwaxellûev $ef waya".
Inna: "Tura a nemfaôaq. Ad ak d fke$ lmaâna n wayen i$ef ur tezmirev a pûebôev, d awez$i".
Lbabuô nni, n igellilen i ixedmen di yill. B$i$ a t ôée$, acku yiwen ugellid, deffir sen, itekkes yal lbabuô, s yi$il.
Wanag ileméi nni, llan imawlan is d lmumnin. Nugad ad iêeppem fellasen tinufqa, tijehli.
Neb$a ad asen d Irr, Mass nnsen, it yifen: win iûfan, iqeôben nezzeh aêunu.

Wanag lêiv, n sin warrac igujilen n temdint. Illa ugerruj seddaw as, i nitni. Babat sen d argaz ilhan. Mass ik Ib$a, ard im$uôen, ara d ssuff$en agerruj nnsen. D aêunu s$uô Mass ik. Ur t xdime$ s lameô iw. D tagi ay d lmaâna n wayen i$ef ur tezmiôev a pûebôev".
Steqsan k $ef Bu sin wacciwen. Ini: "ad awen d awi$, fellas, asmekti".
S tidep, Nefka yas di tmurt, u Nsehhel as iberdan di yal cci.
Iîîef yiwen n ubrid,
armi sanda i$elli yiîij. Iufa i$elli $ef tala ilu$en. Iufa n $uôes agdud. Nenna: "a Bu sin wacciwen, âaqeb iten, ne$ lhu $uôsen".
Inna: "win idensen a t nâaqeb, sinna, ad iu$al ar Mass is at Iâaqeb aâaqeb unekkaô.
Wanag i win iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, akafi igerzen. Ad as Nini i isehlen si lameô nne£".
Sinna, ilêa d yiwen n ubrid,
armi sanda d ineqqeô yiîij. Iufa n ineqqeô ed $ef ugdud, iwumi ur Nefki ar at isdarin segs.
Am akka. Ni$ ibbwev a£ d akw usali s.
Sinna, idda d yiwen n ubrid,
armi ibbwev ger sin iêdiden. Iufa, deffir sen, agdud qôib ur fehhmen awal.
Nnan: "a Bu sin wacciwen, s tidep, Iaouo akked Maouo la ssefsaden di tmurt. A k nxelleû ma terriv ûûuô garane$ yidsen".
Inna: "yif it iyi Ifka Mass iw. Efket iyi afus, ad rre$ ûûuô garawen yidsen.
Awit iyi d tiqaùmtin n wuzzal alamma irgel wayen illan ger idurar". Inna: "ûuvet alamma tekker degs tmes. Awit iyi d ad smire$ fellas nnêas ifsin".
D$a ur zmiren a t id zegren, ur zmiren a t id flun.
Inna: "ayagi d aêunu s$uô Mass iw. Mi d tusa lemâahda n Mass iw, a t Isawi. Lemâahda n Mass iw d tidep".
Assen, a ten Neoo ad ddehmen wa $ef wa. Aûuvu di lbuq, d$a a ten Nessemlil akw.
A d Nessken nezzeh Loahennama, assen, i ijehliyen,
wid iwumi sêurrment wallen nnsen, mgal asmekti W. Llan ur zmiren i usemêes.
Day $ilen, wid ijehlen, ad rren imdanen iW, d imawlan war Nek? Ih, Nhegga Loahennama, d axxam i ijehliyen.
Ini: "ad awen mle$ at igiten imexsuôen sennig wiyav?
Wid iwumi iweddeô laâtab nnsen di tmeddurt n ddunit, wanag nitni nwan gerzen igi"?
Widak d wid i inekôen issekniyen n Mass nnsen, akked temlilit yideS. Mêan igiten nnsen. Ur ten Nwezzen, ass n tnekra.
Atan uqeîîi nnsen: Loahennama, imi jehlen, u mmaâlken deg issekniyen iW, akked imazanen iW.
Ma d wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, axxam nnsen d leonanat n Loennet.
Degs ad wekkôen, ur ssuturen ayen nniven.
Ini: "lemmer ill d lmidad, i wawalen n Mass iw, ad iqqaô yill, uqbel ad fukken wawalen n Mass iw, xas a d nawi i t icban n lmidad".
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weêêan iyi d ar Öebbi nnwen, d Öebbi Yiwen. Win issaramen timlilit n Mass is, ad ixdem ayen ilhan, ur ipcarak yiwen deg waâbad n Mass is".
